channel.title: 🏢 Department of Computer Science, Renmin University of China on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Department of Computer Science, Renmin University of China on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Point-PRC: A Prompt Learning Based Regulation Framework for Generalizable Point Cloud Analysis
item.description: Point-PRC improves generalizable 3D point cloud analysis by regulating prompt learning to harmonize task-specific and general knowledge within large 3D models.
